name: “ゆっくり行こう！”高坂 穂乃果
expansion: Love Live! feat. School Idol Festival Variety Set
flavor_text: 連休はどこかお出かけした？穂乃果も呼んでくれたらよかったのに～っ
ability: 【A】When you use this card's 『ASSIST』, Choose 1 of your Red Characters in battle, during this turn, it gets +1000 Power.
